gui.ascension.title: Skill Tree
gui.ascension.controls_hint: L-Click to Drag, Scroll to Zoom, M-Click to Toggle Skill
gui.ascension.help.active_skill.title: Active Skill Guide
gui.ascension.help.active_skill.drag: Drag icons to slots below to equip
gui.ascension.help.active_skill.keys:
Select Slot: Alt + Num/Scroll
Primary: Alt + L-Click
Secondary: Alt + R-Click
gui.ascension.material_help.reduce_cd: R-Click: Consume material to reduce CD by 25%
message.ascension.parent_locked: Parent locked! You need to learn: %s
message.ascension.criteria_failed: Criteria not met! Check the skill tree.
message.ascension.parent_locked_any: Parent locked! You must unlock at least one parent skill.
message.ascension.refund_points: [Ascension] Skill cost adjustment detected. %s skill points have been refunded.
message.ascension.flight_no_space: Not enough headroom for Sword Flight!
message.ascension.too_hungry_to_start: You are too dizzy from hunger to read...
message.ascension.too_hungry_to_read: You are starving! You put the book down...
message.ascension.reset_cooldown: Reset is on cooldown. Remaining: %s days
message.ascension.reset_success: Skill Tree reset! Skill points refunded.
message.ascension.slot_cooldown_active: Cannot swap: Skill is currently on cooldown!
message.ascension.skill_not_recharged: Skill not fully recharged, cannot unequip!
message.ascension.blink_fail: Could not find a safe destination nearby!
message.ascension.slot_locked: Slot locked! Upgrade the 'Mastery' skill to unlock.
message.ascension.cooldown_full: All skills are ready, no need to accelerate.
message.ascension.no_projectiles: §f[Star Shift] No projectiles nearby to freeze!
message.ascension.wraith_no_target: §f[Wraith's Wrath] No valid targets in sight!
message.ascension.cocktail_drunk: §d[Cocktail] You drank a cocktail and gained: %s
message.ascension.void_touch_fail: §d[Void Touch] Target too hard or out of range.
message.ascension.finification_active: §f[Finification] You feel fins growing on your body...
skill.ascension.mining.desc: Improve efficiency in breaking and creating.
skill.ascension.golden_house.desc.1:
§eEffect: §fHold Right-Click to read Enchanted Books, consuming §fHunger §fto gain §eExperience§f.
§7(XP gain scales with enchantment levels)
skill.ascension.golden_house.desc.2:
§eEffect: §fHold Right-Click to read Enchanted Books, consuming §fHunger §fto gain §eMORE Experience§f.
§7(XP gain scales with enchantment levels)
skill.ascension.golden_house.desc.3:
§eEffect: §fHold Right-Click to read Enchanted Books, consuming §fHunger §fto gain §eMASSIVE Experience§f.
§7(XP gain scales with enchantment levels)
skill.ascension.telekinesis.desc: §7Manifest your will physically, extending your reach.
skill.ascension.zhu_rong.desc: §7Possess a body that devours flames, turning fire into offensive power.
skill.ascension.zhu_rong.desc.1:
§eEffect: §fAllows eating Magma Cream. Each consumed grants §c2 points§f of Fire Damage on the next attack.
§7(Max Stacks: 2)
skill.ascension.zhu_rong.desc.2:
§eEffect: §fAllows eating Magma Cream. Each consumed grants §c2 points§f of Fire Damage on the next attack.
§7(Max Stacks: 3)
skill.ascension.zhu_rong.desc.3:
§eEffect: §fAllows eating Magma Cream. Each consumed grants §c2 points§f of Fire Damage on the next attack.
§7(Max Stacks: 4)
skill.ascension.zhu_rong.desc.4:
§eEffect: §fAllows eating Magma Cream. Each consumed grants §c2 points§f of Fire Damage on the next attack.
§7(Max Stacks: 5 - Set the world ablaze!)
skill.ascension.fire_resistance.desc: §7Your skin has developed a tolerance to heat.
skill.ascension.fire_resistance.desc.2: §eEffect: §fHalves fire damage taken, and extinguishes fire §etwice as fast§f.
skill.ascension.fire_infection.desc: §7Fight fire with fire; let attackers suffer the consequences.
skill.ascension.fire_infection.desc.1: §eEffect: §fWhen you take damage while burning, §cignites §fthe attacker.
skill.ascension.thermal_dynamo.desc: §7Danger driven! Convert heat into kinetic energy.
skill.ascension.thermal_dynamo.desc.1: §eEffect: §f+30%% Movement Speed and §c+20%%§f Attack Damage while burning.
skill.ascension.fire_res.desc: §7You have fully adapted to the heat of the Nether. Like Nether mobs, you are immune to fire.
§7Resonate with the gloomy weather, letting the rain wash away the pain.
§eEffect: §fSlowly regenerates §cHealth §fand §eHunger §fwhen exposed to the sky during Rain/Thunder.
§eEffect: §fSlowly regenerates Health and Hunger, and grants §9Resistance I §f(12s) when exposed to rain.
skill.ascension.sacrificial_strike.desc: §7Utilize gravitational potential energy to launch a devastating strike.
§eEffect: §fFirst attack after a multi-jump hang time deals §c+20%%§f damage.
§7(Damage increases closer to the ground, max +20%% extra)

§eEffect: §fFirst attack after a multi-jump hang time deals §c+40%%§f damage.
§7(Damage increases closer to the ground, max +20%% extra)
skill.ascension.wolf_pack.desc: §7You have forged a deep bond with the pack; they will protect you in times of crisis.
skill.ascension.wolf_pack.desc.1:
§eEffect: §fWhen hurt, there is a §e10%% §fchance to summon 1-2 tamed wolves.
§7(Chance increases with damage taken)
skill.ascension.wolf_pack.desc.2:
§eEffect: §fWhen hurt, there is a §e10%% §fchance to summon 1-3 tamed wolves.
§7(Chance increases with damage taken)
skill.ascension.wolf_pack.upgrade.3:
§a+ Max summon count increased by 1
§a+ Consuming Bones guarantees summon
skill.ascension.wolf_pack.desc.3:
§eEffect: §fWhen hurt, chance to summon 1-4 wolves.
§7(If you have Bones, consumes them to guarantee summon)
skill.ascension.bamboo_cutting.desc: §7Your swordsmanship is as smooth as splitting bamboo.
skill.ascension.bamboo_cutting.desc.1: §eEffect: §fSword or Axe attacks have a §e10%% §fchance to instantly reset attack cooldown.
skill.ascension.bamboo_cutting.desc.2: §eEffect: §fSword or Axe attacks have a §e20%% §fchance to instantly reset attack cooldown.
skill.ascension.bamboo_cutting.desc.3: §eEffect: §fSword or Axe attacks have a §e27%% §fchance to instantly reset attack cooldown.
skill.ascension.bamboo_cutting.desc.4:
§eEffect: §fSword or Axe attacks have a §e33%% §fchance to instantly reset attack cooldown.
§7(Speed is paramount!)
skill.ascension.health_boost.desc: §7Fear of pain leads to maxing out defense.
skill.ascension.dragon_boat_rower.desc: §7Rowing with oars, just like back in version 1.8.
skill.ascension.dragon_boat_rower.desc.1:
§eEffect: §fRowing speed §e+33%% §fwhen holding a Shovel.
§7(Consumes Shovel durability)
skill.ascension.dragon_boat_rower.desc.2:
§eEffect: §fRowing speed §e+66%% §fwhen holding a Shovel.
§7(Consumes Shovel durability)
skill.ascension.brain_in_a_jar.desc: §7What happens if you wear this helmet-looking block on your head?
skill.ascension.brain_in_a_jar.desc.1:
§eEffect: §fGrants §912s §fWater Breathing when wearing Glass on head.
§7(Glass provides 1 Armor, 50%% break chance on hit)
skill.ascension.brain_in_a_jar.desc.2:
§eEffect: §fGrants §924s §fWater Breathing when wearing Glass on head.
§7(Glass provides 1 Armor, 50%% break chance on hit)
skill.ascension.brain_in_a_jar.desc.3:
§eEffect: §fGrants §936s §fWater Breathing when wearing Glass on head.
§7(Glass provides 1 Armor, 50%% break chance on hit)
skill.ascension.brain_in_a_jar.desc.4:
§eEffect: §fGrants §948s §fWater Breathing when wearing Glass on head.
§7(Glass provides 1 Armor, 50%% break chance on hit)
skill.ascension.brain_in_a_jar.upgrade.5:
§a+ Water Breathing duration increased by 12s
§a+ Glass durability significantly improved
skill.ascension.brain_in_a_jar.desc.5:
§eEffect: §fGrants §960s §fWater Breathing when wearing Glass on head.
§7(Glass provides 2 Armor, break chance reduced to 5%%)
skill.ascension.charged_jump.desc: §7Compress your muscles like a spring to release explosive jumping power.
skill.ascension.charged_jump.desc.1: §eEffect: §fSneak and hold Jump to charge. Release to jump §ehigher and further§f.
skill.ascension.charged_jump.upgrade.2: §a+ Charge limit and jump power increased
skill.ascension.charged_jump.desc.2: §eEffect: §fSneak and hold Jump to charge. Release to jump §eextremely high and far§f.
skill.ascension.battle_instinct.desc: §7Forged through a thousand battles, your muscles remember the path of the blade.
§a+ Attack Speed increased to the limit
skill.ascension.adrenaline_burst.desc.1: §eEffect: §fGain §eAbsorption §fand §bSpeed §fwhen taking heavy damage at full health.
skill.ascension.adrenaline_burst.upgrade: §a+ Gain more Absorption and stronger Speed
skill.ascension.adrenaline_burst.desc.2: §eEffect: §fGain §eMassive Absorption §fand §bSpeed II §fwhen taking heavy damage at full health.
skill.ascension.excitement.desc.1: §eEffect: §fRapidly consumes Hunger to §cregenerate Health §fwhen taking heavy damage.
skill.ascension.excitement.desc.2: §eEffect: §fRapidly consumes Hunger to §cregenerate Massive Health §fwhen taking heavy damage.
skill.ascension.hotpot_diner.desc: §7You are a connoisseur of fine food. (Especially ham sausages in hotpot)
skill.ascension.hotpot_diner.desc.1: §eEffect: §fEating cooked meat has a §e10%% §fchance to instantly restore §c3❤§f.
skill.ascension.hotpot_diner.desc.2: §eEffect: §fEating cooked meat has a §e20%% §fchance to instantly restore §c3❤§f.
skill.ascension.hotpot_diner.desc.3: §eEffect: §fEating cooked meat has a §e30%% §fchance to instantly restore §c3❤§f.
skill.ascension.sugar_master.desc.1: §eEffect: §fEating Cake Slices/Pumpkin Pie grants §e1.5 points §fextra Saturation.
skill.ascension.sugar_master.desc.2: §eEffect: §fEating Cake Slices/Pumpkin Pie grants §e3.0 points §fextra Saturation.
skill.ascension.sugar_master.upgrade.3:
§a+ Saturation gain increased by 1.5 points
§a+ Saturation overflow directly heals health
skill.ascension.sugar_master.desc.3:
§eEffect: §fEating Cake Slices/Pumpkin Pie grants §e4.5 points §fextra Saturation.
§7(Overflowing saturation is converted directly into Health)
skill.ascension.hunger_tolerance.desc: §7You are used to the feeling of an empty stomach.
skill.ascension.hunger_tolerance.desc.1: §eEffect: §fAs long as hunger is not zero, Health §acontinuously regenerates§f.
skill.ascension.hunger_burst.desc: §7A final burst in a desperate situation.
skill.ascension.pocket_furnace.desc: §7This furnace is exactly the size of your pocket.
skill.ascension.pocket_furnace.desc.1:
§eEffect: §fAuto-smelts the item in the last hotbar slot without fuel.
§7(Smelts 1 item every 20s)
skill.ascension.pocket_furnace.desc.2:
§eEffect: §fAuto-smelts the item in the last hotbar slot without fuel.
§7(Smelts 1 item every 10s)
skill.ascension.lumberjack.desc: §7You know the texture of every tree.
skill.ascension.hephaestus_favor.desc: §7The God of Forge grants you the ability to discern minerals.
skill.ascension.hephaestus_favor.desc.1: §eEffect: §fDigging Granite/Andesite/Diorite has a §e35%% §fchance to drop Quartz.
skill.ascension.hephaestus_favor.desc.2: §eEffect: §fDigging Granite/Andesite/Diorite has a §e70%% §fchance to drop Quartz.
skill.ascension.hephaestus_favor.desc.3: §eEffect: §fDigging Granite/Andesite/Diorite has a §e70%% §fchance to drop Quartz. Chance to additionally drop §fRaw Iron§f.
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.1:
§eEffect: §fRight-click sand with a Shovel to consume durability and pan for gold. §e5%% §fchance to get Raw Gold.
§7(Chance affected by tool quality and Fortune)
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.2:
§eEffect: §fRight-click sand with a Shovel to pan for gold. §e7%% §fchance to get Raw Gold.
§7(Chance affected by tool quality and Fortune)
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.3:
§eEffect: §fRight-click sand with a Shovel to pan for gold. §e9%% §fchance to get Raw Gold.
§7(Chance affected by tool quality and Fortune)
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.4:
§eEffect: §fRight-click sand with a Shovel to pan for gold. §e11%% §fchance to get Raw Gold.
§7(Chance affected by tool quality and Fortune)
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.5:
§eEffect: §fRight-click sand with a Shovel to pan for gold. §e13%% §fchance to get Raw Gold.
§7(Chance affected by tool quality and Fortune)
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.6:
§eEffect: §fRight-click sand with a Shovel to pan for gold. §e15%% §fchance to get Raw Gold.
§7(Chance affected by tool quality and Fortune)
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.7:
§eEffect: §fRight-click sand with a Shovel to pan for gold. §e17%% §fchance to get Raw Gold.
§7(Chance affected by tool quality and Fortune)
skill.ascension.gold_panning.desc.8:
§eEffect: §fRight-click sand with a Shovel to pan for gold. §e19%% §fchance to get Raw Gold.
§7(Chance affected by tool quality and Fortune)
skill.ascension.academic_miner.desc: §7Your research into ore structures allows you to extract more essence.
skill.ascension.academic_miner.desc.1: §eEffect: §fGain §esa small amount §fof extra experience when mining ores.
skill.ascension.academic_miner.desc.2: §eEffect: §fGain §ea large amount §fof extra experience when mining ores.
skill.ascension.swift_move.desc: §7Light on your feet, walking on flat ground.
skill.ascension.human_dynamo.desc: §7Traveling a thousand miles is better than reading a thousand books.
skill.ascension.sword_flight.desc: §7Man and sword as one, riding the blade.
skill.ascension.sword_flight.desc.1:
§eEffect: §fEquip a sword in the boots slot to fly.
§7Right-click to fly, sprint to accelerate. Consumes sword durability.
§7Crashing into enemies deals damage.
skill.ascension.sword_flight.upgrade.2: §a+ Max flight speed increased by 50%% but durability cost doubles
skill.ascension.sword_flight.desc.2:
§eEffect: §fEquip a sword in the boots slot for high-speed flight.
§7Right-click to fly, sprint to accelerate. Consumes sword durability.
§7Crashing into enemies deals damage.
skill.ascension.thunder_clap.desc: Call upon the wrath of the Storm God, guiding lightning to destroy your enemies.
skill.ascension.thunder_clap.desc.1:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Diamond §7(Summons 3 extra bolts)
§bEffect: §fStrikes §e1 lightning bolt §fat the crosshair.
§3Secondary: §fTarget yourself for the lightning strike.
skill.ascension.thunder_clap.upgrade.2:
§a+ Lightning count increased by 2
§a+ Max charge increased by 1
skill.ascension.thunder_clap.desc.2:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Diamond §7(Summons 3 extra bolts)
§bEffect: §fStrikes §e3 lightning bolts §fat the crosshair.
§3Secondary: §fTarget yourself for the lightning strike.
skill.ascension.thunder_clap.upgrade.3:
§a+ Lightning count increased by 2
§a+ Cooldown reduced by 15s
skill.ascension.thunder_clap.desc.3:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Diamond §7(Summons 3 extra bolts)
§bEffect: §fStrikes §e5 lightning bolts §fat the crosshair.
§3Secondary: §fTarget yourself for the lightning strike.
skill.ascension.invincible_body.desc: Harden your skin, making your body indestructible like metal for a short time.
skill.ascension.invincible_body.desc.1:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Gold Ingot §7(Duration +3s)
§bEffect: §fImmune to magic, projectiles, and explosion damage for 4s.
§3Secondary: §fImmune to any new negative status effects for 4s.
skill.ascension.invincible_body.desc.2:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Gold Ingot §7(Duration +3s)
§bEffect: §fImmune to magic, projectiles, and explosion damage for 4s.
§3Secondary: §fImmune to any new negative status effects for 4s.
skill.ascension.blink.desc: The power of distorted space flows through you; instant movement is nothing to you.
skill.ascension.blink.desc.1:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Ender Pearl §7(Distance x2)
§bEffect: §fTeleport §e12 meters §fforward.
§3Secondary: §fRecord current coordinates. Use again within 8s to §brewind§f to this spot.
skill.ascension.blink.desc.2:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Ender Pearl §7(Distance x2)
§bEffect: §fTeleport §e12 meters §fforward.
§3Secondary: §fRecord current coordinates. Use again within 8s to §brewind§f to this spot.
skill.ascension.blink.desc.3:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Ender Pearl §7(Distance x2)
§bEffect: §fTeleport §e18 meters §fforward.
§3Secondary: §fRecord current coordinates. Use again within 8s to §brewind§f to this spot.
skill.ascension.blink.desc.4:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Ender Pearl §7(Distance x2)
§bEffect: §fTeleport §e18 meters §fforward.
§3Secondary: §fRecord current coordinates. Use again within 8s to §brewind§f to this spot.
skill.ascension.dragon_flame.desc: §7Awaken the ancient dragon veins, pouring devastating fireballs forward.
skill.ascension.dragon_flame.desc.1:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Ghast Tear §7(Fireball count x2)
§bEffect: §fFires §e1 §ffireball.
§3Secondary: §fConsume 16 Copper Ingots + 16 Fire Charges to fire §c9 §fprecise fireballs continuously.
skill.ascension.dragon_flame.upgrade.2:
§a+ Base fireball count increased to 4
§a+ Secondary effect firepower increased
skill.ascension.dragon_flame.desc.2:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Ghast Tear §7(Fireball count x2)
§bEffect: §fFires §e4 §ffireballs.
§3Secondary: §fConsume 16 Copper Ingots + 16 Fire Charges to fire §c13 §fprecise fireballs continuously.
skill.ascension.dragon_flame.upgrade.3:
§a+ Base fireball count increased to 7
§a+ Secondary effect firepower increased
skill.ascension.dragon_flame.desc.3:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Ghast Tear §7(Fireball count x2)
§bEffect: §fFires §e7 §ffireballs.
§3Secondary: §fConsume 16 Copper Ingots + 16 Fire Charges to fire §c16 §fprecise fireballs continuously.
skill.ascension.radiant_avatar.desc: §7Incarnate as the sun walking on earth, purifying all filth.
skill.ascension.radiant_avatar.desc.1:
§eMaterial: §f3 Blaze Rods / 1 Blaze Rod (Secondary)
§bEffect: §fBody emits strong light, dealing §cFire Damage §fto undead within 8 meters.
§7Lasts 12s. Duration resets when burning an undead to death.
§3Secondary: §fOnly gain Glowing effect (45s).
skill.ascension.radiant_avatar.upgrade.2: §a+ Gain Absorption when attacked by undead
skill.ascension.radiant_avatar.desc.2:
§eMaterial: §f3 Blaze Rods / 1 Blaze Rod (Secondary)
§bEffect: §fBody emits strong light, dealing §cFire Damage §fto undead within 8 meters, and gain §e6❤ §fAbsorption when attacked by undead.
§7Lasts 12s. Duration resets when burning an undead to death.
§3Secondary: §fOnly gain Glowing effect (45s).
skill.ascension.star_shift.desc: §7Master the flow of time, and let the world move with you.
skill.ascension.star_shift.desc.1:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Diamond §7(Cooldown reduced to 30s)
§bEffect: §fFor the next 30 seconds, world time (day-night/crops) accelerates §e10x§f.
§3Secondary: §f§bFreeze§f all projectiles within 16 blocks, destroying them after 4s.
skill.ascension.wraith_wrath.desc: §7The resentment of countless souls slain by your sword gathers within you...
skill.ascension.wraith_wrath.desc.1:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Tipped Arrow §7(Damage doubled)
§bEffect: §fAfter charging for 4s, deal a total of §c30❤ §fdamage to all mobs in sight.
§3Secondary: §fInstantly deal §c2❤ §fmagic damage to the targeted mob.
skill.ascension.wraith_wrath.desc.2:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Tipped Arrow §7(Damage doubled)
§bEffect: §fAfter charging for 4s, deal a total of §c40❤ §fdamage to all mobs in sight.
§3Secondary: §fInstantly deal §c2❤ §fmagic damage to the targeted mob.
skill.ascension.wraith_wrath.upgrade.3:
§a+ Total damage increased to 50❤
§a+ Max charge increased by 1
skill.ascension.wraith_wrath.desc.3:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Tipped Arrow §7(Damage doubled)
§bEffect: §fAfter charging for 4s, deal a total of §c50❤ §fdamage to all mobs in sight.
§3Secondary: §fInstantly deal §c2❤ §fmagic damage to the targeted mob.
skill.ascension.steadfast.desc:
§7A demonic creature towers above you, wings spread wide as it howls with laughter. Dead bodies of a tribe surround you while the village is engulfed in terrible dark flames.
The demon calls out, taunting you.
"YOU REALLY ARE THE STRONGEST NOW! Haha.. HEHE... HAHAHAAAAH!!"
This laughter echoes forever...
skill.ascension.steadfast.desc.1:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Gold Ingot §7(Cooldown halved)
§bEffect: §fGain 30 Armor, decaying at a rate of 2 points per second to 0.
§3Secondary: §fInstantly gain §e2❤ §fAbsorption.
skill.ascension.steadfast.desc.2:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Gold Ingot §7(Cooldown halved)
§bEffect: §fGain 30 Armor, decaying at a rate of 2 points per second to 0.
§3Secondary: §fInstantly gain §e2❤ §fAbsorption.
skill.ascension.steadfast.desc.3:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Gold Ingot §7(Cooldown halved)
§bEffect: §fGain 30 Armor, decaying at a rate of 1 point per second to 0.
§3Secondary: §fInstantly gain §e2❤ §fAbsorption.
skill.ascension.cocktail_brewing.desc: §7Mix a mysterious cocktail. The effects are unpredictable.
skill.ascension.cocktail_brewing.desc.1:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Sugar
§bEffect: §fRandomly gain 1 status effect for 12s.
§775%% chance for positive, 25%% chance for negative.
§3Secondary: §fRandomly extend duration of all current effects by a total of 30s.
skill.ascension.cocktail_brewing.desc.2:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Sugar
§bEffect: §fRandomly gain 1 status effect for 12s.
§775%% chance for positive, 25%% chance for negative.
§3Secondary: §fRandomly extend duration of all current effects by a total of 30s.
skill.ascension.cocktail_brewing.desc.3:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Sugar
§bEffect: §fRandomly gain 1 status effect for 12s.
§775%% chance for positive, 25%% chance for negative.
§3Secondary: §fRandomly extend duration of all current effects by a total of 30s.
skill.ascension.cocktail_brewing.upgrade: §a+ Max charge increased by 1. Gaining a negative effect also grants a random positive one.
skill.ascension.cocktail_brewing.desc.4:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Sugar
§bEffect: §fRandomly gain 1 status effect for 12s.
§775%% chance for positive, 25%% chance for negative.
§7If a negative effect is applied, a random positive effect is also granted.
§3Secondary: §fRandomly extend duration of all current effects by a total of 30s.
skill.ascension.void_touch.desc: Voices of the void echo in your ears, as the power of nothingness flows through your fingertips...
skill.ascension.void_touch.desc.1:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Eye of Ender §7(Cooldown halved)
§bEffect: §fInstantly break the block at the crosshair.
§7Uses the tool in your main hand.
§7Cooldown increases with block hardness.
§3Secondary: §fPlace the block from your main hand at the crosshair target.
skill.ascension.void_touch.desc.2:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Eye of Ender §7(Cooldown halved)
§bEffect: §fInstantly break the block at the crosshair.
§7Uses the tool in your main hand.
§7Cooldown increases with block hardness.
§3Secondary: §fPlace the block from your main hand at the crosshair target.
skill.ascension.finification.desc: Glide through the water like a fish.
skill.ascension.finification.desc.1:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Pufferfish §7(Duration extended)
§bEffect: §fSignificantly increase swimming speed for 20s.
§3Secondary: §fInstantly restore 2 bubbles of Oxygen.
skill.ascension.finification.upgrade.2:
§a+ Max charge increased by 1
§a+ Accelerate when ascending in water!
skill.ascension.finification.desc.2:
§eMaterial: §fCopper Ingot / Pufferfish §7(Duration extended)
§bEffect: §fSignificantly increase swimming speed for 20s.
§7Accelerates when ascending in water.
§3Secondary: §fInstantly restore 2 bubbles of Oxygen.
